Description: Our eBay Store About Us Epiphone Les Paul Concert Acoustic/Electric Ukulele (Vintage Sunburst) The ukulele has long been a favorite instrument of guitar players and singers alike, whether its traditional Hawaiian musicians or rockers like Tom Petty, Eddie Vedder and George Harrison. Long known for its history of making great Les Paul guitars, Epiphone expands upon that knowledge and experience with the Les Paul Acoustic/Electric Ukulele Outfit. Like a traditional Les Paul Standard, the Epiphone Les Paul Ukulele features a solid mahogany body combined with a AAA grade flame maple top for great tone and great looks. The mahogany neck features a comfortable “D”-profile shape and is bolted onto the body with four-recessed screws for rock-solid stability. The rosewood fingerboard features a concert length 15" scale with 19 silver nickel frets and a 16" fingerboard radius.Unplugged, this Les Paul Uke has great natural acoustic tone and volume. But plug it in and it really comes alive. Equipped with a high-quality, piezo film pickup located under the saddle, both the natural tone of the strings as well as the sound of and the body are accurately captured and routed to its durable all-metal, rim-mounted 1/4" output jack. Plug it into a PA System or amplifier and it sounds great! And loud too! For accurate tuning stability, the Epiphone Les Paul Ukulele features 14:1 geared machine heads. Unlike traditional "friction" tuners, these tuners have fine-tuning capability and wont slip. The Epiphone Les Paul Ukulele even comes with premium black nylon strings as well as a gigbag with accessory pocket for easy and safe transportation. Top it all off with a classic LP pickguard that not only looks cool but protects the beautiful flame Maple top as well and youve got a real Les Paul ukulele at an affordable price. Features:Body: MahoganyTop: Laminated AAA Flame mapleNeck: MahoganyNeck Shape: SlimTaper “D” ProfileScale: 15”Neck Joint: Bolt-on 4-bolt recessedFingerboard: RosewoodFrets: 19Binding: 1-layer body, frontNut Width: 1-5/16”Hardware: NickelMachine Heads: Open, 14:1 RadioBridge Pickup: Under-Saddle, Piezo FilmControls: PassiveBridge: Rosewood with PVC SaddleCase: Gig Bag includedGet your Epiphone Les Paul Concert Acoustic/Electric Ukulele from Sam Ash direct today with the security of our 45/60 day return/price protection policy. Product Details - Traditional Les Paul Standard shape featuring a solid Mahogany body combined with a AAA flame maple top - Mahogany neck features a concert length 15" scale and bolt-on construction - Rosewood fingerboard features 21 nickel/silver frets with a 16" fingerboard radius - Piezo film pickup located under the saddle, rim-mounted 1/4" output jack Shipping Information Your gear will ship out within 2 days of order confirmation. Title: Epiphone Les Paul Ukulele (Vintage Sunburst) (Used)
